channel.title: outskirts vs wasteland
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "outskirts vs wasteland"

item.title: Re: outskirts vs wasteland
item.content:encoded: You only need some tiles, metal rivet and filter wrapping to make a cloak. Just look on the items-page here at the wiki and you should see the cloaks under the Wasteland tab. The only cloak you need the ancient blueprints for is the Dustcloak of Sneaking.

item.title: Re: outskirts vs wasteland
item.content:encoded: but i need a cloak for filed trip and i need ancient blueprints to make a cloak. that's where i am lost.

item.title: Re: outskirts vs wasteland
item.content:encoded: You can do wasteland missions after you get Goodboy and do the Field Trip quest. To get ancient blueprints you must be season 3+ with a non-ash covered rune and Not Wasteland Disease. Both of those could have been answered by looking through the wiki.

item.title: outskirts vs wasteland
item.content:encoded: i have the option to do outskirts missions but not wasteland anymore. how can i get the necessary allies to receive ancient blueprints? thanks.
